    • loadBoard

      public static ArrayList<String[][]> loadBoard(org.dom4j.Element element)
      Load Board Load board function which loops through each board to "build" it back into a game instance for replaying (this is the opposite funtion to the saving where we take the game object into an XML whereas here we are taking from the XML save back into the game)
      Parameters:
      element - Element cells
      Returns:
      s arrayList of board strings with the transferred xml string objects
